Posts.Content: Nov 13, 2008 08:00AM - edited Nov 13, 2008 08:02AM by therealleigh Hi all, I had my mappings done yesterday and go in for simulation on Wed 11/18.  If that is fine I will be starting rads on Thu 11/19.  I will have 33 treatments.  My rad oncologist said since I have large breasts my chances of burning is higher. I meet with the nurse prior to the simulation to go over skincare etc.  I am so glad to be getting this started.  All the waiting in between the two lumpectomies and mammos was the worse for me.  I like to be moving forward.  Although not to sure about how it will be going everyday through the holidays, but we will see. Love all the info here. Thanks everyone for sharing.
Posts.Title: November 2008 Rads Group HensonChi Ivy
